#include<map>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){

    map<string,char> m;
    int a,t,n,count;
    string s;
    char c;
    map<string,char>::iterator it;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        count=0;
        while(n--){
            cin>>s>>c;

            it=m.find(s);

            if(it==m.end()){
                m.insert(pair<string,char>(s,c));
                if(c=='+') count++;
                else count--;
            }else{
                if(c!=it->second)
                    if(c=='+') {
                        count+=2;
                        it->second='+';
                    }
                    else {
                        count+=-2;
                        it->second='-';
                    }
            }
           // cout<<count<<"  ";
        }
        cout<<count<<"\n";
        m.clear();
    }

    return 0;
}
